thread.title: 2016 Travvy Awards: Less than Two Weeks Left to Enter
thread.title_full: 2016 Travvy Awards: Less than Two Weeks Left to Enter

title: 2016 Travvy Awards: Less than Two Weeks Left to Enter
text:
Last updated: 10:39 AM ET, Mon July 20 2015 2016 Travvy Awards: Less than Two Weeks Left to Enter Travel Agent | Courtney Love | July 20, 2015 
Just two weeks remain to enter the 2016 Travvy Awards, with the absolute final deadline to accept entries being 11:59 p.m. ET July 31. Voting will begin shortly thereafter. If you have not yet entered the industry’s most prestigious awards, now in their second year, you still have time to make sure that your name is on the ballot and in the running for travel agents to vote for you as the best of the best.This year, if you haven’t heard by now, we’ve dramatically expanded the award categories in which you can enter — totaling more than 375! This gives practically every travel supplier, destination, executive and travel professional the opportunity to enter. 
In about three weeks, travel agents will begin to cast their votes. Will they vote for you? Chances are your competitors have already entered. If you know that you are the best tour operator, cruise line, destination, car rental company, airline, airport, cruise port, airline consolidator, hotel/resort or travel technology company, now’s the time to enter at www.travvyawards.com .
